mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route (user_id, start_time, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{startTime}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE route SET end_time = #{endTime}, distance = #{distance}, duration = #{duration}, status = 'ended' WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND start_time = #{startTime}
mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname, SUM(dr.duration) AS duration FROM daily_record dr JOIN user u ON dr.user_id = u.id GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY duration DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT u.nickname, SUM(dr.duration) AS duration FROM crew_member cm JOIN user u ON cm.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN daily_record dr ON dr.user_id = u.id WHERE cm.crew_id = #{crewId} GROUP BY u.id

SELECT c.goal_type, AVG(dr.duration) AS averageDuration, SUM(dr.duration) AS totalDuration FROM crew c JOIN crew_member cm ON c.id = cm.crew_id JOIN daily_record dr ON cm.user_id = dr.user_id WHERE c.id = #{crewId}
